page.title: 17Tourism in Holmfirth
page.content: The area around Holmfirth is becoming well known as a tourist attraction. People first became interested in the area because of the B.B.C.Television programme{'Last of the Summer Wine' which was filmed in and around the town. We did a{survey}in which we asked tourists questions about Holmfirth.64% of the people we asked had visited the town because of the television programme.72% of the people came from outside West Yorkshire.When asked what they thought of Holmfirth, 81% of the sample said they liked it. The most{popular features}were the old stone built houses and the narrow rambling alleyways.They also liked the countryside and reservoirs around Holmfirth.When tourists come to Holmfirth they spend most of their time browsing around shops.
